ï»¿OFFICIAL o 7 -/ 7 DOCUMENTSr The World Bank 1818 H Street N.W. (202) 473-1000 INTERNATIONAL BANK FOR RECONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT Washington, D.C. 20433 Cable Address: INTBAFRAD INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION U.S.A. Cable Address: INDEVAS September 13, 2012 Mr. Bill Kilby Team Leader Central Asia Asia Division Department for International Development 1 Palace Street London SWIe 5HE England Dear Mr. Kilby: Amendment to the Administration Arrangement between the Government of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development and the International Development Association concerning the Trust Fund for Central Asia Regional Migration Program Single-Donor Trust Fund (TF No. TFO 71752) 1. We refer to the Administration Arrangement between the Government of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the "Donor") and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) and the International Development Association (IDA), (collectively, the "Bank") regarding the Central Asia Regional Migration Program Single-Donor Trust Fund (TF No. TFO71752) (the "Trust Fund") effective December 5, 2011 (the "Administration Arrangement"). 2. Pursuant to recent discussions between the Bank and the Donor regarding the extension of the closing date, the Bank proposes to amend paragraph 10.1 of the Administration Arrangement to read as follows: Paragraph 10.1: "10.1. It is expected that the Contributions will be fully disbursed by the Bank by December 31, 2013. The Bank shall only disburse Contributions for the purposes of this Arrangement after such date with the written approval of the Donor." 3. All other terms of the Administration Arrangement shall remain the same. 4. The Bank will disclose this Amendment and related information on this Trust Fund in accordance with the World Bank Policy on Access to Information. By entering into this Amendment, the Donor consents to disclosure of this Amendment and related information on this Trust Fund. RCA 248423. Ll WUI 64145 L FAX (202) 477-6391
ï»¿-2- September 13, 2012 5. We propose that this letter shall constitute an amendment to the Administration Arrangement between the Bank and the Donor. Please confirm your acceptance to the foregoing, on behalf of the Donor, by signing and dating the two originals, retaining one original for your records and returning the other original to the Bank. Upon receipt by the Bank of the original Amendment countersigned by you, this Amendment will become effective as of the date of the countersignature. Sincerely, INTERNATIONAL BANK FOR RECONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION Saroj Kumar Jha Regional Director Central Asia CONFIRMED AND AGREED: DEPARTMENT FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT By: Date: 2 Name: I / & Title: e(Iymp 1),j' 7e6a'01 /0"mwf
